element.name: TColCubEngine.Initialize
element.short: Initializes the Playfield with given Cols and Rows

element.name: TColCubEngine.Shuffle
element.short: Shuffles the Playfield and starts the Game

element.name: TColCubEngine.MoveCol
element.short: User-Move: Moves the Column by Index

element.name: TColCubEngine.MoveRow
element.short: User-Move: Moves the given Row by Index

element.name: TColCubEngine.IsComplete
element.short: Is Complete computes if all the tiles are in the right place

element.name: TColCubEngine.Rows
element.short: Configuration-Value Rows sets the Number of Rows in the Playfield

element.name: TColCubEngine.Cols
element.short: Configuration-Value Cols sets the Number of Columns in the Playfield

element.name: TColCubEngine.Tile
element.short: Property Tile gives the id of the tile for a (X,Y)-Position

element.name: TColCubEngine.Moves
element.short: Moves gives the Number of User-Moves

element.name: TColCubEngine.EditMode
element.short: Editmode=true is for editing the Playfield

element.name: MaxShuffle
element.short: MaxShuffle sets the number of shuffeling-steps
